subject: Fix serverless function deployment by removing vercel devDep and adding build script
body:
Two issues were preventing successful Vercel builds:

1. `vercel` in devDependencies caused Vercel to warn "will be
   ignored" and strip it before npm install, creating a mismatch
   with the lockfile. Removed it since the Vercel CLI is provided
   by the platform.

2. No `build` script existed â€” if the Vercel project has a build
   command configured (even the default `npm run build`), it would
   fail. Added a no-op build script since serverless functions
   don't need a build step (Vercel compiles TypeScript automatically).

https://claude.ai/code/session_017jorRZB6ANxXDQhyH1Xdom
title: Fix serverless function deployment by removing vercel devDep and adding build script
